original_title: An Impossible Conundrum: The Making of 'The Killing of a Sacred Deer'
overview: In this featurette, producer Ed Guiney, Yorgos Lanthimos, Colin Farrell, Barry Keoghan, and Nicole Kidman discuss the production of The Killing of a Sacred Deer and explain what makes it unique.
title: An Impossible Conundrum: The Making of 'The Killing of a Sacred Deer'
